
based on opennhd2-r64.12 from scp

= MAKE: =
for oe-alliance:
[code]cd /(oe-alliance-path)/build-enviroment/meta-oe-alliance[/code]
[code]svn co http://neutrinohd2.googlecode.com/svn/branches/recipes-neutrino recipes-neutrino[/code]
[code]cd (oe-alliance-path)/build-enviroment/builds/(DISTRO)/(MACHINE)[/code]

for openpli3.0:
[code]cd (openpli30-path)/openpli-oe-core/meta-openpli[/code]
[code]svn co http://neutrinohd2.googlecode.com/svn/branches/recipes-neutrino recipes-neutrino[/code]
[code]cd (openpli30-path)/openpli-oe-core/build-(MACHINE)$[/code]

[code]. ./env.source[/code]
[code]bitbake neutrino[/code]

result can be found here:
for oe-alliance:
(oe-alliance-path)/build-enviroment/builds/(DISTRO/(MACHINE)/tmp/deploy/ipk/mips32el/neutrino_svn(svnrevision)-r64.12_mips32el.ipk

for openpli3.0:
(openpli30-path)/openpli-oe-core/build-MACHINE/tmp/deploy/ipk/mips32el/neutrino_svn(svnrevision)-r64.12_mips32el.ipk

= INSTALL: =
- copy neutrino_svn(actuall svn rev)-r64.12_mips32el.ipk to /tmp
[code]opkg install /tmp/neutrino_svn(actuall svn rev)-r64.12_mips32el.ipk[/code]

-librtmp:
copy librtmp0_2.4+git484+df6c518-r1_mips32el.ipk to /tmp
[code]opkg update && opkg install --force-overwrite /tmp/librtmp0_2.4+git484+df6c518-r1_mips32el.ipk[/code]

kill enigma2
[code]init 2[/code]

start neutrino
[code]neutrino & [/code]

= CAUTION: =
be sure that is enought place in flash;-)

Have fun with neutrino
